metadata.title: CVE-2020-5312 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
libImaging/PcxDecode.c in Pillow before 6.2.2 has a PCX P mode bufferoverflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-5312` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-imaging - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.3
python-pil - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.3
python-pil.imagetk - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.3
python3-pil - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.3
python3-pil.imagetk - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-0ubuntu1.3').
